channel.title: [Suggestion] Replay mode
channel.description: I'd like the ability to bring up past games and replay them, viewing all whispers/chat/actions/etc. It would be helpful to see exactly how something happened and would probably cut down on reports from people that misunderstand how things happened.

item.title: [Suggestion] Replay mode
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Or just saving it to disk. The game could produce a transcript of every game you play, then save it on your HD - they’d be tiny if you exclude death notes (admittedly a problem), and not too big even with DKs included.
